name: Fantasy Mosaics 14: The Fourth Color
description:
Enjoy mosaic puzzles in more colors than ever!


Our penguin family just discovered the fourth color for our mosaic puzzles! Along the way, they brought a new palette of colors to choose from as well!

Now it's up to you to experience the colorful puzzles and meet new inhabitants in the penguin world.

Get ready for the new achievements featuring stars and cups awarded at the end of each level.

Enjoy this installment with exciting innovations that make the puzzles even more fun and challenging!


- Mosaic puzzles in even more colors also known as picross, hanjie, nonograms, griddlers, paint by numbers.

- A new palette of colors

- New achievements

- Puzzles based on logic
